resources.string:
Here will be listed the last songs loaded by the user. 
 A ListView will be needed here for the list of songs. 

 MediaPlayer class will be used to playback when a user selects a song.

This intent will contain a list of albums. The albums will be listed as folders and when the user clicks on an album he will be redirected to a new activity that contains the melodies in that album.

 I believe that for this section I need to use ListView to list all the albums created by user and saved in a folder specific created for this purpose in the app. 

 All the songs will be from the phone's memory or SDCard.

This intent will contain a list of favorites melodies. In this activity the user will have the possibilities to listen to the melodies listed here. All the albums will be found in MediaStore.Audio class. \n\n I will use ListView for the list of songs and Media PLayer Class for playback.
This intent will contain a list of customized lists of melodies. The lists will be listed the same as the albums.

This intent will contain a list of the last melodies listened. This list will have a maximum number of melodies and the user will have the possibility to play all the songs listed here. \n\n ListView will also be used here for the list of songs. Media PLayer class will also be used for playback of the songs.

This intent will contain details about the selected melody from the main screen. 

 Here, the user will play, pause, etc. the melody and can select to return to the main screen or add the song to the favorites. 

 For the playback Media Player class will be used and for the user to have control over the song MediaController class will be used.
